website_summaries.verdict: Overall, the response for the New Balance 1340 v3 was mixed. While many runners enjoyed this stability shoe’s agreeable fit, comfortable platform, and easy-to-secure shoelaces, others criticized its build-quality and its weight. Some people also believed that the in-shoe experience was stiff. When it received praise, the 1340 v3 was painted in grace, but when it was panned, it seemed an entirely different shoe. Suffice it to say that to try it out first before purchasing would be a wise decision.
pros: Some testers were happy with the shoe’s exceptional fit
Many reviewers agreed that the shoe was comfortable
A buyer noted that he did not experience any foot pain while wearing the shoe
The shoelaces were lauded for being elastic and easy to secure
According to a few users, the shoe provides an impressive in-shoe feel
cons: One of the purchasers commented that the shoe was a little stiff
A consumer claimed that the outsole rubber separated quickly from the bottom of the platform
People felt that this running shoe was too heavy for extended use

customer_reviews.title: I Tried and I Tried...
customer_reviews.text: Since I have flat feet, I have to be very careful in choosing which athletic shoes to buy. This one seemed like a good bet (considering its substantial midsole arch support) but I got a massive blister on my left pinky toe after my first 5-mile run with it. I figured it needed to be broken in and my feet needed to get used to it so I've attempted to transition it into my workouts these last few months and it still provides pain on my left foot's left side. The pain also manifests itself even when I wear them to get groceries and other errands. I'll be switching back to my tried and true fried - Asics.
customer_reviews.author: accordboy23

customer_reviews.title: Recommend it for hikes
customer_reviews.text: Get your feet sized at a local New balanced store so you can buy the correct size and fit for your feet. Be sure you are tightening up the bottom of the shoe laces before committing to wear them. Expect some time to break the shoes in. I’m a New balance user for 9 years now. I do not recommend this shoe if you are running on concrete because the shoe is pretty bulky, even if the size and fit are correct. The shoe is okay for jogging (not running). It’s great for hiking on trails because the bulky bottom adds comfort stepping on jagged rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and supportive shoes
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleased with the fit and comfort of these shoes. I find this shoe to be highly supportive for long durations of standing or walking. The soles are more supportive than other shoes, but I still prefer an orthopedic sole inserts of some kind over the stock inserts. Great shoes!
customer_reviews.author: A. Davie

customer_reviews.title: Possible counterfeits.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these shoes for a few months, and they’re already coming apart. I’ve bought many New Balances in the past and never before had these problems which leads me to believe that these may be counterfeits.
customer_reviews.author: Tania Roubion

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I like the NB line of 900 and 1300 series as they have great support--they just are not affordable at their retail price....
customer_reviews.author: Michael B. Harstrick

customer_reviews.title: Run time!
customer_reviews.text: Rubbed my head for first so many miles. Now they are broken in and I live them. I have messed up feet and NB always seems to work for me. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: B-Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Love the Shoe.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best walking shoes I have used. Gives the best support of all the New Balance I have worn.
customer_reviews.author: James Kantor

customer_reviews.title: Bad Shoe. Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Causing my feet a lot of pain. Don’t buy as the breaking time takes forever. I ran 2 marathons as they still hurt my feet
customer_reviews.author: NJPD

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing them for awhile now. Love the fit and quality.
customer_reviews.author: The Concrete Cowboy

customer_reviews.title: Comfort, price
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet, so when ever I could get a good deal on a pair of shoe or sneakers. for discount price is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: danny arango

customer_reviews.title: Nice show for using on treadmill, high box that I needed
customer_reviews.text: This shoe fit like a glove. I use it exclusively for walking on my treadmill and find it quite superior to my old running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Tried these after wearing 983 for years. These are horrible. Cannot recommend at all
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 6E and it definitely fits as it should. Style isn't bad either. Happy overall.
customer_reviews.author: I_MOVE_STUFF

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe just a little heavy but very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Coop44

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, added an over pronation insole and it's heaven.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. The first pair was so comfortable I bought a second
customer_reviews.author: dakota1

customer_reviews.title: Shoes feel really good. I can wear them all day long no ...
customer_reviews.text: Shoes feel really good. I can wear them all day long no problem. I have wide feet and these shoes fit as they should. I'm very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Zenewicz

customer_reviews.title: Terrible shoes
customer_reviews.text: Worst New Balance shoes I’ve ever worn. I’ve worn NB for more than two decades and have never experienced anything like the discomfort these shoes cause. The top of the toe box consistently constricts across the tops of my feet and have created a line of soreness that makes them completely unwearable. This design should be discarded and New Balance should start from scratch.
customer_reviews.author: J. Chad Davis

customer_reviews.title: This version of the shoes hurt
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying the 1340 line of shoes for many, many years. The V3 version is the least comfortable shoes I've ever worn. My feet hurt just wearing them. I thought that maybe these needed to stretch out, which no other version of these shoes required. After a month of wearing them, my feet ache and generally hurt. I've switched back to my old pair of V2 of these and my feet feel fine. I'll need to find a new line of shoes that offer the same support as these used to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst pair of New Balance I have ever owned. Do not purchase if you have flat feet. I have been wearing them with pressure relief insoles since purchase. Brought them on a family vacation this week and developed blisters on the arches of both feet within several hours of walking. I have never had blisters on my arches before, quit painful, made the next four days of walking at the Magic Kingdom very painful. These will be going into the garbage when I get home as I am well past the return date.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Spakowski

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t buy these again
customer_reviews.text: I gave the 1340 v3 a try to see if they might be an acceptable replacement for the pair of 1540 v2 that I wore out. They’re about half the price of the 1540’s, but still overpriced because they’re poor in quality and comfort. There is no padding along the sides of the shoe, so you feel the stitching, they’re heavy, and the pair I received didn’t have one of the shoelace eyelets punched through. Unfortunately I needed to wear them until I could order a different style, so I couldn’t just return them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Macrae

customer_reviews.title: Not the running shoe I would expect from New Balance!
customer_reviews.text: These are the heaviest running shoe I have ever encountered. They are noisy...they squeak as if you were walking on a squeaky floor! They are lacking a loop at the heel to assist in pulling them on. These are something I would expect to find in a PayLess shoe store! I WOULD NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: poet

customer_reviews.title: 2nd Try
customer_reviews.text: I have worn New Balance made in the USA shoes for many years. The size has always been 9 2E. I ordered these and they were just a bit too small and caused discomfort after about an hour so I returned them. Thinking they were irregular I ordered a second pair. Same problem. Apparently they are smaller in width than all the others I have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: R. Toma

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove!
customer_reviews.text: I need good shoes so I don't mind paying extra as long as they last me a few years and AS LONG AS THEY FIT. I have extra wide feet and when these say 6E, they mean 6E. I wore them around the house for an hour or so, then on the treadmill. I'm keeping them and I couldn't be happier to find some decent shoes to replace my old ones.
customer_reviews.author: P. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable running shoes I have ever had on my feet and the motion control negates my over-pronation and keeps my feet headed in exactly the right direction. Love these shoes and what a PITY that they have been discontinued by New Balance. I just don't understand their decision making.
customer_reviews.author: VanDuck

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are my go-to shoes and I have purchased them every time I need new shoes. For my feet, they fit great, provide good stability and the recessed foot bed is excellent to accommodate orthotic inserts.
customer_reviews.author: Heather H.

customer_reviews.title: Almost a winner
customer_reviews.text: Thank goodness for easy returns. The logo on the tongue feel almost completely off on both shoes. Weird but unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: aponor

customer_reviews.title: Best motion control
customer_reviews.text: I am always skeptical about shoe revisions but, New Balance did a nice job on this from the previous 1340. The shoe did feel a touch uncomfortable for about a week after purchase but, this was resolved after breaking them in. Some people are saying the toe box is bigger but I haven’t noticed any difference. If you liked the 1340 v2 this version should work well for you. Personally I have tried out many motion control shoes and New Balance has been the best.
customer_reviews.author: genks

customer_reviews.title: Love New balance but
customer_reviews.text: These shoes aren’t as comfortable as older NB shoes I have bought. I work in a busy trauma center in the ER and need my shoes to do well. These aren’t the best. I wish they wouldn’t have discontinued the ones I used to buy every 6 months or so. One thing I noticed is they squeak a lot when walking. Weird huh! I finally put some baby power under the insoles and they don’t squeak as bad.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Werner

customer_reviews.title: This would be good shoe for many people.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are not as comfortable as a pair of NB 1260's for walking. I have to take out the insoles and replace them with inserts from the my foot doctor for any shoe that I wear. The inside fit is a slight bit larger than the 1260''s, but has not been a problem. I have gotten good comments about their looks. I alternate them with a pair of 1260's, but if I'm planning a longer walk the 1260's go on.
customer_reviews.author: beaudog

customer_reviews.title: Same size 1530v3 does not fit the same as 1540v2
customer_reviews.text: Something subtle appears to have changed with the 1540v3 (version 3) from the 1540v2. The new version is not as wide. I returned the shoes and now I appear to be stuck with a massive restocking fee. When the sizing is not as expected it becomes completely impractical to shop for sized items online.
customer_reviews.author: D from FL

customer_reviews.title: Fit to size
customer_reviews.text: The great thing about New Balance is that they fit to size. I have a wide foot and NB always has the right fit. Long time consumer of NB shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch K.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality replacement for my 1012's
customer_reviews.text: New Balance made a huge mistake discontinuing the original 1012 platform and replacing it with these lame shoes.
customer_reviews.author: The Concrete Cowboy

customer_reviews.title: Size vs Size Chart
customer_reviews.text: The size ordered based on the size chart was inaccurate. The size delivered was larger than the chart indication. The shoe was returned
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad they are Back
customer_reviews.text: Always said the previous version were the most comfortable shoe I had ever worn! These are just as good. Absolutely love them!
customer_reviews.author: Toni christensen

customer_reviews.title: Hubby no complaints
customer_reviews.text: Size was perfect! My husband didn't feel any pain after walking at the park.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndirella

customer_reviews.title: Good looks, average cushioning
customer_reviews.text: Good looking shoes, but I'm a heavy person and I didn't find the cushioning that great.
customer_reviews.author: Sarosh

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t find on NB web site
customer_reviews.text: Second pair of these but I don’t think NB make them anymore
customer_reviews.author: David Covington

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: A little wide but not to the point of returning.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: ok shoes
customer_reviews.text: If you lace them too snug, they hurt my toes. I have to find the sweet spot to keep them on, but not hurt my toes.
customer_reviews.author: robb bledsoe

customer_reviews.title: The dad shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to go with my jean shorts and corvette. So far so good
customer_reviews.author: Brian H

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t fit quite right.
customer_reviews.text: Felt good around the toes but too tight on top.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Moray

customer_reviews.title: Quite the versatile athletic shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, well made running/walking show. I’ve been wearing them with casual dress clothes also because they look so good too.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne's World

customer_reviews.title: High quality wide shoe
customer_reviews.text: NB has always been the go to shoe for those with wide feet. This model is prefect but on the pricey side.
customer_reviews.author: pawemwdad

customer_reviews.title: Some made in the USA
customer_reviews.text: Just as stayed this is my second pair of them
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for running.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. I have never used NB but dispate the color (I dont like the white) it feels great. I love my new shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Edmundo Casanova

customer_reviews.title: Always the same
customer_reviews.text: I am a New Balance fan for this reason: they always fit the same. The size is always true and consistent. Out of the box or out of the closet, they always fit.
customer_reviews.author: Larry R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this same model of shoe several times. When it first came out a few years ago it was great. Since then, the quality seems to deteriorate as they come out with new models. This one seems to run a little small.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Terrell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable shoe to ever have my foot in it. Extra wide gives plenty of room and the support is outstanding on my sore feet. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Donald M

customer_reviews.title: Cushion support
customer_reviews.text: Best support he’s ever had in a New Balance shoe.
customer_reviews.author: R B H

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as it used to be!
customer_reviews.text: Same shoe I have worn for years. This model falling apart only after couple months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Business Customer Steve

customer_reviews.title: Best Shoe for Orthotic Inserts
customer_reviews.text: There are only a couple of shoes on the market that are ideal for orthodic inserts. This is one of them. Plus, these shoes resist wearing out in the toes.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Wiz

customer_reviews.title: Exchange shoes
customer_reviews.text: Replace item because damaged can I get refund money please
customer_reviews.author: Danny Chan

customer_reviews.title: Much appreciated birthday gift at great price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes for my 71 year old husband He said said they are extremely well padded, fit perfectly and has received many compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Foot doctor recomended for stability.
customer_reviews.text: Foot doctor recomended, seems to be working, foot pain seems to be non existant at this point!
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: New Balance 1340 v3 are comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: How light and comfortable they are for every day activities.
customer_reviews.author: Lori H.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for and at a competitive price
customer_reviews.author: Mary Pugliese

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The comfort is good but the shoe is very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew N. Callaway

customer_reviews.title: which felt like a 2x4 was used for the sole
customer_reviews.text: Fit ok, but this shoe is too stiff. Granted, it is a Motion Control shoe, but I believe if I were 200 plus lbs, it would give more( I am 6'2' with 175 lbs.). Also, this shoe reminds me of Asics Gel MC that was out in the 80s, which felt like a 2x4 was used for the sole.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Bell

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, attractive, high quality
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several pairs of New Balance shoes in the past and have always found them to be exceptional, long-lasting and excellent quality. This show is no exception and provides superior support and comfort for not just running but for anyone who has to spend a lot of time on their feet. The shoe has an attractive design with white, blue and gray stripes and panels. Two eyelet shoe-lace holes are included at the top of the rim of the shoe. The shoe is a bit bulky in design but very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip O.

customer_reviews.title: Keeping the shoe in stock
customer_reviews.text: The shoe meets my running needs. The price is right!
customer_reviews.author: dreamweaver

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My son likes these a lot. They don’t feel or look cheap and he says they are quite comfortable. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: New Balance Men's M1340v3 Running Shoe
product_meta.description: Featuring leading-edge midsole technologies, the 1340v3 men's running shoe is among New Balance's most supportive footwear options. The newly updated upper is crafted from breathable-yet-durable synthetic/mesh construction. Meanwhile, ABZORB cushioning offers superior impact resistance, while a T-Beam insert helps deliver torsional stability in the shoe and arch support through a unique center beam design.
